Anonymous reporting submits crash reports automatically. In no way is personally-identifiable information collected. Logs pertaining to the crash along with system information (i.e. model, firmware, baseband, kernel, etc.) are collected to allow us to understand why a crash occurred and to improve our applications and fix bugs. At any time you are welcome to disable reporting with no consequences.
